settings.heading: Our quality
settings.text: We use only the highest-standard white goose down and feathers. The silky-smoothest cotton from world-class mills. Meticulous artisans who carefully hand-craft each piece you order. Advanced technology for cutting-edge comfort.

settings.image_banner_title: Enjoy the comfort of perfect confidence in:

settings.heading: Our purity
settings.text: After going through our all-natural, powerful cleansing process, your down comes to you pristinely clean, odorless, and 100% hypoallergenic – safe in every way.

settings.heading: Our durability
settings.text: Yes, it’s hard to believe you can toss luxury down into the machine and get it back perfect. It’s hard to believe you can use a pillow or comforter for years and still enjoy like-new loft. But at Comfydown, it’s true.

settings.heading: Our service
settings.text: Customers all praise the smooth, supportive experience they enjoy here. Fast shipping, total reliability, prompt responses, extra-mile help. Maybe it’s because we really, truly care.

settings.heading: Our ethical sourcing
settings.text: You can relax all the way. We source every fiber responsibly, with respect and concern for our feathered friends. We’re certified by world-leading sustainability sentinels:

settings.description: Only the highest quality down for all-night softness and all-day fluff.
Every ComfyDown product is allergy-free, guaranteed.
Find the perfect support, with 12 levels of support to choose from.
We use only the finest fabrics and highest craft standards. No pokes. No floating feathers. No loose down.
All our down is responsibly sourced, so no feathered friends get hurt.
Open your pillow and enjoy it right away — minus any fowl odor.

settings.name: Lauren, verified buyer.
settings.body: As soon as I found ComfyDown,  I knew I wouldn’t have to go anywhere else. The quality of their products is what really drew me. The fill is perfect and never comes out. 3-4 years later, the pillows still look great, standing up nicely and keeping their loft like new. Their customer service is also fantastic. The website is easy to order from, the shipping is fast and reliable. All the details add up to a great experience.

settings.name: Bonnie
settings.body: “I’ve never spent this amount on a pillow before, but I was desperate for a comfortable night’s sleep. I am thrilled with this down pillow. It is supportive and squishy all at once. I love this. And I’m thankful that my neck doesn’t hurt when I wake up.”

settings.name: Traci M
settings.body: “Without a doubt the best pillows for the price. When used they flatten down a bit, super soft, but you can easily fluff them back to what you see in the pic.”

settings.heading: Not sure which product is puff-perfect for you?
settings.text: Get guidance in a supportive chat with one of our comfort experts.
